body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Eversole. Father of Margaret and Abner Eversole. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860. Mustered into service as a private in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on January 15, 1862. Deserted in November 1862. 1st Lieutenant of the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from February 1863 to March 1864. Captain of the Three Forks Battallion in 1865.
